bites.title: Count of destProject
bite: Strengthening Humanitarian Coordination and Advocacy in the occupied Palestinian territory
Country Strategic Plan for food assistance to the poor and severely food insecure population in the West Bank and the Gaza Strip
Promoting the inclusion and access of Children with Disabilities to education in the emergency context of the Gaza Strip

Improved protection mechanisms for most vulnerable groups in the West Bank and Gaza through increased access and quality mental health and psychosocial  services with comprehensive and gender sensitive approach
Increase preparedness and improve response for affected women and children from C19 at Quarantine Centers and home quarantine in the Gaza Strip.
Support life-saving & life-sustaining MHPSS interventions to mitigate self-harm and risky behaviors undertaken by Palestinian youth in Area A-B &C, H2, East-Jerusalem, and Gaza Strip
